description:
Online Drumlessons For Young And Old. Learn Different Techniques & Fills From The Comfort of Your Home And Smartphone. Start Directly, No Drumset Or Talent Needed!

  • Learn how to play 4 and 8th notes
  • Learn how to play an 8th note fill
  • Learn how to count measures
  • Learn how to play in 80% percent of all styles of music like Pop, Rock, Hip Hop and more
  • A unique online drum method where you can learn your favorite rhythms and drumlicks within 15 lessons.
  • 15 online lessons where you can learn techniques.
  • Learn to be a drummer within 15 lessons.
  • Including music notations.
  • Available 24 hours a day where and whenever you need them.
  • Super easy learning method.
  • This method is created by a drumteacher with 12 years of live performance experience in music and drumming.
title: Drum Lessons For Beginners
